short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Extension to collect Design Inspirations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DesignShots allows you to capture full-page screenshots of websites and organize them in one clean, accessible platform. With DesignShots, you can easily gather design inspiration from across the web and store it all neatly in one place.
